revision.text:
'''Fossils''' are petrified organic relics that can be unearthed in the [[Underground]]. They may either be traded for [[Plate|Shard Plates]] or objects that can be sold for [[Diamonds]], or put into the hatchery to obtain Fossil Pokemon. Note that every kind of fossil can be found in the Underground regardless of story progress, but certain ones can only be put into the hatchery after reaching certain regions. =Released= {| class="wikitable" |- ! Region !! Fossil !! Mine layout !! Pokémon |- | rowspan = 3 | [[Kanto]] || [[File:DomeFossil.png|50px]]
Dome || [[File:DomeFossilMine.png|100px]] || [[File:Kabuto.png|40px]] Kabuto |- | [[File:HelixFossil.png|50px]]
Helix || [[File:HelixFossilMine.png|100px]] || [[File:Omanyte.png|40px]] Omanyte |- | [[File:OldAmber.png|50px]]
Amber|| [[File:OldAmberMine.png|100px]] || [[File:Aerodactyl.png|40px]] Aerodactyl |- | rowspan = 2 | [[Hoenn]] || [[File:RootFossil.png|50px]]
Root || [[File:RootFossilMine.png|100px]] || [[File:Lileep.png|40px]] Lileep |- | [[File:ClawFossil.png|50px]]
Claw || [[File:ClawFossilMine.png|100px]] || [[File:Anorith.png|40px]] Anorith |- | rowspan = 2 | [[Sinnoh]] || [[File:SkullFossil.png|50px]]
Skull || [[File:SkullFossilMine.png|100px]] || [[File:Cranidos.png|40px]] Cranidos |- | [[File:ArmorFossil.png|50px]]
Armor || [[File:ArmorFossilMine.png|100px]] || [[File:Shieldon.png|40px]] Shieldon |- | rowspan = 2 | [[Unova]] || [[File:PlumeFossil.png|50px]]
Plume || [[File:PlumeFossilMine 0-7-3.png|100px]] || [[File:Archen.png|40px]] Archen |- | [[File:CoverFossil.png|50px]]
Cover || [[File:CoverFossilMine 0-7-3.png|100px]] || [[File:Tirtouga.png|40px]] Tirtouga |} =To Be Released= {| class="wikitable" |- ! Region !! Fossil !! Pokémon |- | rowspan = 2 | [[Kalos]] || Jaw || Tyrunt |- | Sail || Amaura |- | rowspan = 4 | [[Galar]] || Fossilized Drake || Dracozolt, Dracovish |- | Fossilized Dino || Arctozolt, Arctovish |- | Fossilized Bird || Dracozolt, Arctozolt |- | Fossilized Fish || Dracovish, Arctovish |}
revision.comment: /* To Be Released */ Galar fossils (should they be in a new table to show the combos?)

They may either be traded for [[Plate|Shard Plates]] or objects that can be sold for [[Diamonds]], or put into the hatchery to obtain Fossil Pokemon.
